analysis.name: murderparty
analysis.description: A game project likely developed using the Godot Engine.
achievements: Developed core game mechanics, including 3D model import and resource management.
Designed and implemented game assets using varied formats such as glb, png.
Established project structure, including directories for models, scenes, scripts, assets, and shaders.
key_features: 3D Model Integration:  Includes 3D models (.glb) showcasing direct implementation within the game environment.
Scene Management:  Manages game scenes (.tscn) indicating the orchestration of game elements and event handling.
Shader Implementation: Employs shader code within the game, suggesting visual customization or effects.
skills: Game Development: Extensive knowledge and experience in game development principles.
3D Modeling and Asset Integration: Proficient in integrating 3D models, textures, and assets into a game engine.
Scripting: Applied scripting to develop game logic and control gameplay features using GDScript.
